name: Death Delivery Lite
description:
Death Delivery Lite  is fast-paced bullet time First Person Shooter

Inspired by Hotline Miami and F.E.A.R!

Enjoy flashy visuals and satisfying effects.

rush your way into non-stop action levels without getting hit even once...yes ONCE because you die in one shot!

Its hard, but so is life of hire gun.

are you up to the task?

!! Lite version only includes 2 levels!!

If you like what you experience 

!!I kindly ask you to provide FEEDBACK and DONATION so project can turn into FULL GAME!!

Enjoy 

made by GogaGames.

CONTROLS :)

WASD - move

RMB - shoot / hit

LMB - ADS / trow

MMB - pickup/trow

SHIFT - silvertime (slowmo.)

Q - rage!

V - kick!

C - crouch
